::DarkMouse::

She looked at Scorponok. "You know, I think that my little friend 
there likes you.  He seems quite happy all curled up on your shoulder 
like that." She smiled at him with a warm smile.
She was happy too.  She was headed back to her base and with the bot 
for whom she cared greatly for.

They were still a ways away from the base and she looked forward to a 
nice walk in the forest.  She reached up and gently squeezed the hand 
that was on her shoulder.
